name: You, Calligrapher
description:
《You, Calligrapher》is an authentic VR Chinese Calligraphy simulator.

In 《You, Calligrapher》, you will be empowered to imitate the masterpieces of Chinese poets and scholars, draw and paint with traditional chinese ink pen. Witness and experience the culture of Calligraphy!

Featuring




- Realistic ink brush physics



- Mutiple color for painting and writing



- Caligraphy and Chinese learning
- Templates of masterpieces
- Save & Share your words, paints, illustrations...etc
- Collection of classic Chinese musi
